definition[0]: the ability to learn, understand, and think about things
example[0]: To be good at the game, you need a reasonable level of intelligence.
example[1]: John showed high intelligence from an early age.
definition[1]: a high level of this ability
example[2]: a woman who had both beauty and intelligence
definition[2]: information about the secret activities of foreign governments, the military plans of an enemy etc
example[3]: According to our intelligence, further attacks were planned.
definition[3]: a group of people or an organization that gathers this information for their government
example[6]: In Britain there are three main intelligence organizations.
